refnamediv.refpurpose: provide TorX explorer interface to an LPS

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The &lps2torx; tool provides a TorX explorer interface to the linear process equation (LPS) in &infile;. If &infile; is not supplied, &cstdin; is used.
The LPS can be explored using TorX as described in torx_explorer(5).
